TopicTitle: Remode the "enf caps" from the service bays

Articles.Content: I know a lot of people want Mk1/Mk2.5 cargo bays, and I think I have a solution that would not require adding more parts to the game. What if SQUAD changed the service bays so that they are open-ended, so you can out as many in a row as you want. This means you could make a larger cargo bay rather than just a place for storing experiments.

I know a lot of people want Mk1/Mk2.5 cargo bays, and I think I have a solution that would not require adding more parts to the game. What if SQUAD changed the service bays so that they are open-ended, so you can out as many in a row as you want. This means you could make a larger cargo bay rather than just a place for storing experiments.

There was a mod that did just that, it was amazing. I'd love this feature!

In fact, it makes the game more consistent: How come cargo bays are open ended but service bays are not?
Is there an issue with attachment points if it is open ended?

Is there an issue with attachment points if it is open ended?

Doubt it, cargo bays to just fine, don't they? And they have two nodes at each end.
I'm uninterested in aircraft, so I haven't messed with those parts much.

I'm in support of this. the service compartments would be much better for it.

would also be nice if you could open one door at a time.
